reviews.review: Игра просто восхитительна! Динамичный и захватывающий сюжет, простой гемплей, отличное звуковое сопровождение. Эта игра просто легенда и уж точно она ей стала не просто так. Не буду спойлерить, но сюжет будет вас держать до конца. А главный протагонист этой игры- великий и молчаливый Гордон Фримен и его знаменитая монтировка должен быть удостоен вашего внимания. На прохождение сюжета вам понадобиться часов 10-14. Так что вперед! Спасем Сити 17!

I am sad to say, that I read an article online.  This article was about how If half life 3 will be made, valve cannot make it, they will have to send the game to ubisoft to develop the game. Why, Why Gabe did you have to spend all your money on TF2 hats, and not enough on new games.   I think we should honor this fallen ser by giving another playthrough, and downloading the game and it's addons.

Great for its time and worth playing for the story, creative weapons, and level design.  I will give it my recommendation for that alone.  The A.I. is so frustrating though.  The enemies always respond the same way and can see you instantly from any distance-- even if you are crawling through weeds a quarter-mile away.  If you can see them as a speck on the horizon, they can see you and start shooting.  The A.I. is just as bad for your allies that are more in your way than helping you.  Getting upstairs is nigh impossible if you have four of these losers riding your coattails.  Thank the developers for giving us the gravity gun so we can barricade them in a room where they will sit tight and not get themselves or you killed.  The incredibly annoying A.I. makes the game seem very repetitive and one-dimensional because you can never change the way you engage them.  Sneaking up on them is pretty much never going to happen, unless they have purposely designed a scene where you come into a room behind an enemy focused on something else.  Wouldn't it make more sense for a physicist like Dr. Freeman to take down his enemies in a more methodical and most times clandestine way?  In this game you are kind of forced to go in guns-a-blazin' all the time.  Perfect Dark and a host of other games that are older had better A.I.  Maybe a mod could fix this and give the game some replayability.

Half-life 2 la continuacion del aclamado Half-life 1 y el primer juego en estrenar el motor source.Es un gran juego tiene una historia extensa y muy entretenida,por supuesto aclamada por muchos gamers y la comunidad.Nos enfrentaremos a la Alianza junto a los rebeldes para liberar a ciudad 17 del dominio del doctor Breen el antiguo administrador de Black Mesa y uno de los culpables en causar la secuencia de resonancias,Volveremos a ver a personajes de la anterior entrega como Barney,Eli,etc.Conoceras Armas nuevas y una jugabilidad bastante distinta a la entrega anterior.Te enfrentaras a nuevos enemigos y conoceras nuevos personajes en esta historia de ciencia ficcion mas aclamada.No solo eso tambien usaras veiculos y de una manera mas dinamica y divertida.Hace no tan poco salio un pequeño remake de este juego que mejora la calidad de texturas y los shaders son un poco mas intensos.

Nt:El sountrack de este juego es gratuito descargalo para escuchar las canciones de este gran juego.
Tened Un Buen Dia y Buen Gaming

Наверное только Valve имеет игру с настолько классным взаимодействием с объектами. К сожалению не посчастливилось мне сыграть в нее в пик своей популярности, и поэтому прошел только сейчас в 2014 году. Но игра стоит того! Удивительно но за десять лет она практически не устарела. В ней есть все. Отличный сюжет. Красивая графика. Отличная атмосфера восточной европы. Советую всем! 
P.S. Извращенный современными играми, я даже предствавить не мог того, чтобы поднять трамплин, нужно снизу бочки с воздухом накласть. Кто проходил, поймет)

XУЙНЯ ПОЗОРНАЯ, НА СКРИНШОТАХ ДРУГИЕ МОДЕЛЬКИ У ЗОМБИ.
МЕНЯ НАEБАЛИ
НО ПАМИМА ЕТАВА ВОТ ПЕРЕЧИСЛЕНИЕ ВСЕХ МИНУСОВ ИГРЫ:

ГЛАВНЫЙ ГЕРОЙ СЛИШКОМ ЧАСТО МАТЕРИТСЯ И ВЫКРИКИВАЕТ РЕПЛИКИ, ЭТО РАЗДРАЖАЕТ К КОНЦУ ИГРЫ.
ДЕЙСТВИЯ ПРОИСХОДЯТ В РАШКЕ НО СПУСТЯ ДОXУЯ ЛЕТ ПРЕЗИДЕНТ НЕ ПУТИН. КАК ТАКОЕ МОЖЕТ БЫТЬ? ИСПРАВЬТЕ, ПОСТАВЬТЕ ПУТИНА.
У АЛЕКС СЛИШКОМ МАЛЕНЬКАЯ ЖOПА, МНЕ ПРИХОДИЛОСЬ ИСПОЛЬЗОВАТЬ ВНУТРИИГРОВОЙ БИНОКЛЬ ДАБЫ РАЗГЛЯДЕТЬ ЕЕ МИКРОСКОПИЧИСКУЮ ЖOПУ. Я СРАВНИЛ ЕЕ ЖOПУ С ЖOПОЙ КЛЯЙНЕРА И КЛЯЙНЕР ВЗЯЛ ВЕРХ (НИЗОМ)
У МОССМАН ТРИУГОЛЬНЫЕ СИСЬКИ
НЕГР НЕ ИГРАЕТ ДЖАЗ. Я ДОЛГО ЖАЛ НА НЕГО КНОПКОЙ "ИСПОЛЬЗОВАТЬ", НО ОН ТАК И НЕ ЗАПЕЛ.
САМЫЙ ОГРОМНЫЙ СКАМ В ИСТОРИИ ВИДЬЯ ИГР СТАВЛЮ ЭТОЙ ИГРЕ 6 БАНАНОВ ИЗ 96 АНТИЛОП ГНУ ЗА СЕКСУАЛЬНУЮ ЖOПУ КЛЯЙНЕРА

Hello.
This isn't the game of my taste, but despite that...it really got me hooked in.
I like games like GTA and COD, so when I saw this along with the Orange Bundle at a cheap discount, I was thinking
"meh, it comes with Portal 1 as well...and at least I can make Half Life 3 jokes once I play 2"

Now I have not completed it but I have played enough to give my short review.
For those wondering, I was playing this on Linux (Lubuntu 32-bit) and I felt this is an excellent port.
The source engine that powers HL2 is really good, I like the physics and rag doll effect.
It's satisfying to throw a box at some zombies and seeing them drop to the ground.
The Source engine is my favorite engine because of this.

Now, I unfortunally have not played Half Life at all, so I don't know the full story 100%.
Despite that, Half Life 2 has no problems introducing new comers to the franchise.

I recommend new-comers to download the Black Mesa mod, this is a mod that recreates Half Life 1 story.

And now with that said, I just want to say something.

There are 3 half life games (HL1, HL1 Source, HL2, EP1 and EP2 are DLC and Lost Coast is a benchmark)
There are 3 half life games.
#HalfLife3Confirmed

Wait...HL1 Source is a remake of HL1...
....
#HalfLife2confirmed...?

Mein erster Egoshooter den ich jemals gespielt habe...
war NICHT Half Life 2 sonder Counter Strike Source mit 8 Jahren ;)

Ich mochte Css, obwohl ich (immernoch) schlecht drin war. 
 
Später habe ich dann durch Zufall mitbekommen, das Valve noch andere Spiele gemacht hat,
die auch auf der Source Engine laufen. Habe mir dann mit 12 Jahren Half Life u. Half Life 2 gekauft.
Habe zuerst das eine und dann das andere durchgespielt und ich muss leider zugeben, dass mir der 
erste Teil (also Half Life 1) besser gefallen hat :'(

Aber es ist günstig, hat eine packende Story mit Relax- und Actionmomenten.
Es gibt viele Unterschiedliche Szenarien und Gegner. Kreative Waffen gibts auch ;) (Gravity Gun in einem CoD wäre geil).

Besonders gut finde ich, das es gar keine Cutszenes gibt (Außer Anfang und Ende), die einem aus dem Geschehen
holen oder den wiederspiel Faktor zerstören :D 

Es ist ein tolles Spiel und niemand kann sich PC Gamer nennen, ohne das Spiel zumindest zu kennen.

The sequel to the critically acclaimed Half-Life, Half-Life 2 breathes new life into the series.

After the cliffhanger of the original Half-Life, Gordon Freeman is once again thrust into an alien invasion. This time, however, the invaders have effectively taken control of every resource and major population center on Earth. The prowess of the invaders is staggering, at least until Freeman manages to obtain another crowbar. After meeting with some old allies,  a terrible mistake exposes Freeman to the dictatorship in control of Earth, which leads to the mobilisation of all available units with the sole purpose of destroying Freeman.
Without giving too much away, mayhem awaits.

The plot of Half-Life 2 really is quite impressive, especially when considering that Half-Life had only a simple story. Half-Life 2 branches off from the original in an impressive manner, showing off the impressive writing talents of the Valve team. The plot is discovered through typical Half-Life fashion: your surroundings. While it's no Dark Souls in terms of plot, it doesn't obviously point out all the plot points, nor does it pause your game to tell you insignificant amounts of information.

Gameplay in Half-Life 2 is similar to the original, except with a new arsenal and significantly larger environment. While restrained to the Black Mesa facility in Half-Life, Freeman is free to explore the world in the much largr sequel. This leads to more epic fights, environments and strategies.
The new space is well utilised in most cases. Helicopters must be shot down, yet can do significant damage to any areas where you may hide. The Combine will attempt to ambush you whenever possible, which leads to surprises.

The enemies and environment are impressive. The environment depicts what happens to Earth after being completely dominated by atechnologically superior force, and the aliens fit into areas apropriate for them, such asthe Antlions whom live under sand in beaches.

Overall, I would say that Half-Life 2 builds on the original game in every way, yet it does not replace it. It creates an amazing world and great cast of characters that you will feel attached to, even the silent protagonist Gordon Freeman and the seemingly omnipotent G-man. I highly recommend this game, for its story, gameplay, characters and everything else that makes it amazing.
